Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Yesss... my mail box gets cluttered for nonsense such as this. Now 
then all shut and listen as the great Qs7 speaks. Ellen, stop spamming and 
acting like you control the damn RPG. number 1, thats been done by me and 
several others before to varying degrees except I pointed out rules being 
broken, please dont be a copycat and be original. 

Now then as for this who christ delivering so and so blah blah blah, lay off 
the religious stuff in the RPG. Me I believe theres a god, do I go to church? 
No. Call me heathen, call me a blasphemer, call me an asshole, call me 
whatever you want but the fact of the matter is I believe that if you believe 
there is some higher form of being, your good. Now then... onto this whole 
Witch craft thing. Not everything in witch craft is related to the devil, so 
don't start associating it with the prince of darkness himself. No I don't 
practice it, however I do know some people who were heavily into it and Ellen 
unless you are a newbie or just plain stupid, you will know of the Rule of 
three. Which means if you cast a spell on a person for no good reason it will 
come back on you three times worse. And believe me, I know someone who has 
had experience with that. If you want to try and spread fear around 
threatening witchcraft on people, more power to you. Just try to remember 
these threats tend to be out dated by the time you turn 13, whenever that is. 

Ah and yess.. No threatening people over the RPG mail string or over email in 
general, because #1 even if you say you are into witch craft, im guessing 
about umm almost everyone doesnt believe you. #2 Its email, how can you 
threaten a person through email? "Oh Im gonna kick your ass!" Yeah sure,  
come on down to the east coast spend a thousand a dollars or so and show up 
at my door with a bat and then MAYBE i'll take you seriously, or I might just 
think your a delusional psycho and have your ass shot by either cop that 
lives about 2 seconds from my house with a walk. Just as a note, I live in NJ 
so if you lvie there, come on down I got nothing better to do.

Now then, with this mail I would appreciate the mass mailings of this debate 
to stop, but I know they wont and this post will generate a mass amount of 
flames and more debate as well as idle threats. But ah well, its my job and 
damn it, I love it.

~Qs7, LN, Alex, Chaos, Whatever- Whee! JUME! and more Whee!

--part1_17.2e0fa4d1.2aad3177_boundary

Now then... onto this whole Witch craft thing. Not everything in witch craft is related to the devil, so don't start associating it with the prince of darkness himself. If you want to try and spread fear around threatening witchcraft on people, more power to you. Just try to remember these threats tend to be out dated by the time you turn 13, whenever that is. 
<BR>
<BR>Ah and yess.. Just as a note, I live in NJ so if you lvie there, come on down I got nothing better to do.
